repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: Tamil version of the Vikramacarita, that is, 32 stories (Tamil katai) about the king Vikrama (Vikkiramātittaṉ) told to king Bhoja by the figurines (Tamil patumai) of his throne.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2020).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

filiation.p: GOML R. 1972, R. 2244. UVSL, vol. 4, pp. 246-7, No. 2040. TMSSML, vol. 1 , 1925, Nos. 579 and 589.

extent.measure: I.e. extent of main textual unit (U1).

additions.desc: Title printed in golden letters: VIKRAMARKEN KADAI TAMOUL (spine).
Shelfmark in black ink N°14 and title Vicra marken kadey (f[1]r).
Small sheet of paper, inserted in the binding between u5 and U1, bearing in black ink the title Vikramarken Kadai Tamoul. Note for the binder indicating the title to be displayed on the spine.
Catalogue reference in black pencil: Catal. Imper. N° XIV (f[1]r).
Title in black ink: Vicramarcoum catta. (f[1]r).

binding.p: Leather cover, with title and heraldic lilies on the spine.

origin.origDate: 1729 at the latest. Dated to circa 1750 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1750 by Cabaton (1912).

provenance.p: Possibly copied in Pondicherry by a Jesuit.

acquisition.p: It appears to be the paper Vicramarquen Cadey and Vicramarken Kadey sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1729 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in ancien lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5r and f9r).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 49, no. 421.
S.n. 1739. Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales. Paris: Typographia Regia. — See p. 434, no. XIV.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 96r, no. 421.
Zvelebil, Kamil Veith. 1997a. The Tamil Vikramaditya. JAOS 117.2: 294-305.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
